title: Simulacrum Divergence
outcome: A pawned data chip surfaces containing a simulation of Stenograd that diverges after Halden's death, revealing an alternative, more inclusive path for the city's governance. As free zone councils study the simulation, political tensions escalate when Directorate officials attempt to suppress its influence, while citizens question which reality is real and which is fabricated.

events.description: A merchant in a free zone market sells a mysterious data chip containing a real-time simulation of Stenograd. Tech-savvy residents quickly see its predictions diverging from the city’s recent course.
Free zone councils organize pop-up forums to explore the alternative pathways revealed by the simulation, sparking intense debate about the city’s true history and possible futures.
Directorate officials issue urgent directives to confiscate all simulation copies, claiming they pose a clear threat to order. Several councils refuse, hiding and distributing the data covertly.

Simulated 'Halden survival protocols' inspire experiments in shared leadership and open resource allocation in more zones. Council factions feud over whether to adopt the simulation’s recommendations.
Citizens in simulated-governance zones begin publicly questioning the legitimacy of Council-authority, demanding a reckoning with the city’s hidden past and stirring unrest citywide.
